about.summary:
Applied AI / ML Engineer with nearly three years of experience spanning data engineering, applied machine learning, and GenAI systems. Strong background in building reliable data pipelines and analytics foundations, followed by hands-on ownership of ML- and LLM-driven systems including RAG pipelines, agentic chatbots, and hyper-personalized learning workflows.

Experienced in taking internal proof-of-concepts from data ingestion and modeling through experimentation, optimization, deployment, and platform integration. My work focuses on building AI systems that are measurable, scalable, and grounded in real product constraints such as latency, cost, and reliability.

SQL (complex queries, joins, aggregations, stored procedures)

Azure Storage (Blob Storage, Data Lake Gen2)
Data quality checks, validation, and logging
Power BI dashboards and internal analytics

Agentic AI systems with stateful, multi-step reasoning

API-based integration of ML and LLM systems

Deployed using Flask + React with Docker and real-time DB sync
